name: Ninja Quest
description:
This is a game made for Week 154 of the Weekly Game Jam where you try to stop ninjas from reaching the ground and capturing yo, due to an unfortunate misunderstanding regarding reallocation of orphanage funds (the deepest this game gets). You do this with three different types of weapons: a rock, a paper sword or a shrunken.

Due to an engine bug, the game has  a random chance to crash when advancing to the next level. If you're lucky, you can do 1 or 2 levels until it does so. With enough tries, you can finish it, so it's actually a feature meant to increase replayability.

Only windows is supported, but if you go to the GitHub (https://github.com/The-8-Bit-Developers/Ninja-Quest), you can compile from source and run it on MacOS or Linux. 

Controls are WASD as well as 1, 2, and 3 to select weapon. Left click throws weapon.
